question: بُشِّرَ
answer: he has been given good news

question: لَنُبَوِّئَنَّهُمْ
answer: surely We will give them position

question: فَلَنُحْيِيَنَّهُ
answer: then surely We will give him life

question: وَلَتُسْأَلُنَّ
answer: And surely you will be questioned

question: يُسْتَعْتَبُونَ
answer: will be asked to make amends

question: فُتِنُوا
answer: they had been put to trials

question: لَهَدَاكُمْ
answer: surely He would have guided you

question: وَتُوَفَّىٰ
answer: and will be paid in full
